title: So, WoW or FFXIV... which is goinna be more fun?
body: It's a question that's been asked a million times, I know, but what's goinna be more fun in the long term? I know I'm asking for opinions, and that no one can tell me if I'd like a game, just tell me why you like / dislike either game, and tell me about how the content is doing these days. Trying to convince myself to stick to either one.
